text:
When the content of the default publication is imported, null pointer exceptions are displayed in the console window; everything else seems to work as expected.

Stacktrace fragment:

creator: ragaller@apache.org

text: The NPEs occur when the homepage is requested. They seem to be related to the news inclusion; after commenting out the news include statements they don't occur anymore.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: The news overview page or single news items don't trigger the NPEs.
creator: andreas@apache.org
ragaller@apache.org
text:
(In reply to comment #1)
> The NPEs occur when the homepage is requested. They seem to be related to the
> news inclusion; after commenting out the news include statements they don't
> occur anymore.
> 

I was just digging as well and found that spot too - the error occurs as well when the include transformer is used (instead of the cinclude transformer).
